name: Merry Christmas Hidden Objects The Kids Adventure
name_original: Merry Christmas Hidden Objects The Kids Adventure
description:
Free Hidden Objects Game .... Specially Made for Below 5 Year kids.

Kids can learn with Fun.
- Lear with Shape for Observation skill.
- Identify Objects with Spelling.
- Improve Reading & Listening Skill.

12 Different Packages in this game
==========================
- Birds
- Vehicles
- Christmas
- Color
- Shape
- Animals
- Fruits
- Kitchen Tool
- Music Instruments
- School Time

Christmas Special Hidden Objects for kids & Family.
"Merry Christmas Hidden Objects The Kids Adventure"

Extraordinary HD Graphics ..... !!!

FREE Game to Play ..... !!!

Different Christmas characters
Here's an enjoyable way for kids to develop their observation skills.

Amazing Levels , HD Levels.
Hint is also Available. you can find the hidden objects with help of hints.
